Cindy Rollins is a veteran, retired homeschooling mom of 9. She inspired a whole generation of homeschool moms to explore the philosophy of Charlotte Mason.
Cindy Rollins homeschooled her nine children for over 30 years using Charlotte Mason's timeless ideas. She is the author of Mere Motherhood.
